CustomField.formula: Service_Fee_inc_GST__c + Brokerage_Service_Fee_inc_GST__c + Up_Front_Commission_inc_GST__c + Monthly_Trail_Commission_inc_GST__c * 12*2.7 - Monthly_Trail_Commission_inc_GST__c * IF(ISPICKVAL(TC_Commences__c, "After 6 months") , 6, IF(ISPICKVAL(TC_Commences__c, "After 1 year"),12,0))
CustomField.label: 3 year gross income inc GST
